messages.title: My pledges to you
messages.content: - I will serve the whole community and work hard to earn your trust... - I will stand up for our public services, for fair funding for our schools and against Tory cuts to our police... - I will work to get a fair deal for Lancaster and Fleetwood, whether that's fighting for investment in jobs and our local economy or protecting our environment for the next generation...

messages.title: Cat Smith - a strong local voice delivering the change we need
messages.content: Lancaster and Fleetwood needs a strong voice in Parliament... The Tories and Lib Dems have let our area down with broken promises and failed policies... It's time for change...

keyPolicies.policyDescription: A strong economic foundation is vital... Labour's plan for a stronger economy will create a more prosperous future for Britain...
We must ensure that every child... has the opportunity to succeed...
The NHS is our country's most precious institution... Labour will invest in... the NHS we need for the 21st century.

issues.economy: A strong economic foundation is vital...
issues.education: We must ensure that every child...
issues.environment: protecting our environment for the next generation
issues.health: Labour will invest in... the NHS we need for the 21st century.

housing.content: We will build hundreds of thousands of affordable homes to rent and buy each year...

endorsements.endorsement: Alison... says 'Cat Smith is someone... When she speaks, people listen'
James... says 'Cat listens and understands the issues... She's got her heart in the right place.'

quotes.text: 'Cat Smith is someone who truly cares about local people. When she speaks, people listen.'
'...Cat listens and understands the issues facing people like me. She's got her heart in the right place.'

images.caption: Cat Smith with Labour Party members supporting her campaign
